General.Name: Doktas Dokumculuk Ticaret ve Sanayi AS
General.Description: Döktas Dökümcülük Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. manufactures and trades in cast iron, ductile iron, pig, and aluminum castings for the automotive, heavy commercial vehicles, agriculture, construction and mining, and machinery manufacturing, as well as e-mobility and other sectors in Turkey. The company also produces aluminum wheels. It also exports its products. Döktas Dökümcülük Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was formerly known as Componenta Dökümcülük Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi and changed its name to Döktas Dökümcülük Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. in April 2018. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Bursa, Turkey. Döktas Dökümcülük Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. is a subsidiary of Çelik Holding A.S.
General.Address: Fatih Mahallesi Göl Yolu No: 26, Bursa, Turkey, 16801
